testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlESSObservationMetadataRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.5.7 [Need to Share ESS Organizational Metadata] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send ESS Metadata Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.6.4.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N53R675_Send_ESS_Metadata_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N53R675_Send_ESS_Metadata_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}
Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Username is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N53R679_Username_Supported = ${TMDD_N53R679_Username_Supported}
Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Password is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N53R680_Password_Supported = ${TMDD_N53R680_Password_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Collector Configuration Information (CollectorConfig) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N53R681_Collector_Configuration_Information__CollectorConfig__Supported = ${TMDD_N53R681_Collector_Configuration_Information__CollectorConfig__Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Owner Organization - ESS Metadata is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N53R684_Owner_Organization___ESS_Metadata_Supported = ${TMDD_N53R684_Owner_Organization___ESS_Metadata_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Data Collector Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N53R757_Data_Collector_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N53R757_Data_Collector_Information_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - ESS Metadata is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.6.4.3.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N53R759_Restrictions___ESS_Metadata_Supported = ${TMDD_N53R759_Restrictions___ESS_Metadata_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N53R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N53R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 13 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlESSObservationMetadataRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N53R675_Send_ESS_Metadata_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 14 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 14.1 VERIFY that an eSSObservationMetadataMsg message was received.
Step 14.2 VERIFY that an ess-data-set-file-name data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.3 VERIFY that an ess-data-set-file-directory-path data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.4 VERIFY that an ess-data-set-file-access-protocol data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.5 VERIFY that an ess-data-set-file-access-address data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.6 VERIFY that an ess-data-set-file-access-port-address data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.7 VERIFY that an ess-observation-collection-frequency data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.8 VERIFY that an ess-observation-collection-offset data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.9 VERIFY that an ess-host-server-offset-minutes data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 14.10 VERIFY that an ess-host-server-time-zone data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata

Step 14.11 VERIFY that an ess-host-server-daylight-savings-in-effect-flag data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 14.12 IF TMDD_N53R679_Username_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 14.12.1 VERIFY that an user-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 14.13 IF TMDD_N53R680_Password_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 14.13.1 VERIFY that a password data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-observation-data-set-metadata
Step 14.14 IF TMDD_N53R681_Collector_Configuration_Information__CollectorConfig__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 14.14.1 VERIFY that an ess-observation-positional-order data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata

Step 14.14.2 VERIFY that an ess-observation-label data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata

Step 14.14.3 VERIFY that an ess-observation-units data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata

Step 14.14.4 VERIFY that an ess-observation-decimal-scaling-factor data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item.ess-collector-configuration.ess-collector-metadata
Step 14.15 IF TMDD_N53R684_Owner_Organization___ESS_Metadata_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 14.15.1 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item
Step 14.16 IF TMDD_N53R757_Data_Collector_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 14.16.1 VERIFY that a data-collector-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item
Step 14.17 IF TMDD_N53R759_Restrictions___ESS_Metadata_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 14.17.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSObservationMetadataMsg.ess-observation-metadata-item
Step 14.18 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 15 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 15.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 15.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 15.7 IF TMDD_N53R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 15.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 16 EXIT
